text: 22:11 Esekiel 3:27; Daniel 12:10; 2 Timoti 3:13Gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amiba, me dar amu mangɨvɨra ikɨ. Eghtɨ gumazamizir arazir mɨzɨrɨzibagh amiba, me dar amu mangɨvɨra ikɨ. Eghtɨ gumazamizir arazir aghuibagh amiba, me arazir aghuibar amu mamaghɨra ikɨ. Ezɨ gumazamizir God baghavɨra itiba, me Godɨn gumazamizibar ikɨvɨra ikɨ.”
